content:
TITLE: Setting Up Leaflet-Geoman Development Environment
DESCRIPTION: A series of shell commands to clone the repository, install dependencies, and run various development tasks for Leaflet-Geoman.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geoman-io/leaflet-geoman/blob/develop/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
nvm use
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm install
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm start
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm run cypress
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm run test
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm run lint
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm run prepare
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Development Server
DESCRIPTION: Command to compile and run the development version with watch mode enabled.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geoman-io/leaflet-geoman/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run start
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies with PNPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to install all required npm packages for the project using PNPM package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geoman-io/leaflet-geoman/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Production Version
DESCRIPTION: Command to compile and build the production version of the plugin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geoman-io/leaflet-geoman/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run prepare
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Cypress Tests
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute Cypress tests for the plugin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geoman-io/leaflet-geoman/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running ESLint Check
DESCRIPTION: Command to perform ESLint code quality checks on the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geoman-io/leaflet-geoman/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run lint
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Opening Cypress Test Window
DESCRIPTION: Command to open the Cypress test runner interface.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geoman-io/leaflet-geoman/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run cypress
```
